page.title: 01THE LLANDYSUL AREA
page.content: Llandysul is a rural village in the centre of a{FARMING}community. It is built around a Norman{CHURCH}on the banks of the{RIVER TEIFI}on which {ANGLING}and{CANOEING}take place. Recent{HOUSING DEVELOPMENT}has led to the growth of the village which has its special{NEW YEAR CUSTOMS}an annual{CARNIVAL WEEK}and a{FIRE {STATION.}The elderly and disabled inhabitants benefit from a{MEALS ON {WHEELS}service and a{RESIDENTIAL HOME. {INDUSTRY}has recently taken its place alongside established businesses like{ {GOMERIAN PRESS. }A new{SPORTS COMPLEX} caters for {LEISURE}and {CULTURAL} activities are arranged by{EIN STIWDIO {NI.}Welsh speaking pupils leaving the{ {PRIMARY SCHOOL}attend a new{BILINGUAL} {SCHOOL}set up in the village. The car is the main means of{TRANSPORT}for residents and{TOURISTS.
